title: Yemeni Civilians Trapped Between Saudi Airstrikes, Rebel Attacks
teaser: A coalition led by Saudi Arabia, with U.S. support, has been carrying out airstrikes in Yemen against rebels. At the same time, the rebels, called Houthis, are battling their opponents in the streets.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
